title: New: RAINES – Ghosts
body:
This is undoubtedly the most beautiful debut track you’ll hear this month.

Sure it’s drenched a little with the sort of vibes that the master of ‘conscious uncoupling’, Chris Martin, would probably murder for, but don’t let that detract from the elegance and smoothness of **RAINES’** (Mike Nelson) debut composition, _Ghosts_. It’s a festival closer, a relationship ender, it’s the scene in the film where the lovers race across town to meet each other in time for a New Years kiss, it’s a Vodafone advert in waiting… but all in all, it’s transcendentally wonderfully. Soak it up.
